STOP NERFING MY {{champion:268}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
He needed to be nerfed, and still does need to be. Dude is too strong and has too much presence in lane.

I feel you dude, but don't worry, our glorious Emperor still has late game power. Riot just wants to give the non-royalty a chance to keep up to our hawk-father.

Just shift to CS instead on wasting mana on harras early levels.

Don't worry about the nerfs, our Emperor is just trying to find his New Groove in the meta.

Ezreal: "Thanks for saving me Taric! I forgot my swimmies."
Taric: "This man needs mouth-to-mouth CPR! Everybody clear!"
Ezreal: "What!?"

Taric: "Looks like his Speedo is cutting off circulation.  Bring the scissors!"
Ezreal: 0_0

Finally! Leona can, too, become GROSSLY INCANDESCENT during Jolly Cooperation!

Thats not even the right pool party {{champion:21}}  splash art lol
I didn't think i would live long enough for them to fix any Yasuo bugs but they actually did it. Now i'm worried i'm going to die soon.
As an Azir main, I really hope you don't intend to hurt him even MORE. I have a few ideas tho.
He is more of a late game champion now. and tbh his soldier sight range was op.
On orders of the League of Legends, Azir started summoning his soldiers with sand blindfolds so that they couldn't tell Azir about anything they couldnt reach with their spears.

They did nothing to him.

They just had him in there to get people to shut up about him getting the shaft.

"nothing"

Do you know how to read? lol
And before you rage about me saying this, Azir deserved those nerfs.
His early was far too oppressive when he's meant to be lategame.

However, he is, was, and will be still one of the worst and weakest mid picks possible.
And the only way that's going to change is with a large redesign/rework/buff/nerf/change series on Azir.

oppressive? have you played against Xerath? that is oppressive, but he just got buffs.

Anyway, i think a rework or redesign is not a good idea, he is among the most funny and challenging champs to use. But as long as most of players dont know how to play against him, or how the hell he works riot will continue to make mistakes with his nerfs.

I just played taliyah with her new w and they ruined her... they removed the lockdown but you cant walk and cast w or else w gets canceled out. I just dont understand why make it like rumble ult. victor and rumble both deal damage with a line and has long range but taliyah deals damage on a spot...so it already hard to land and you cant get the combo off unless your near the enemy it becomes that much hard to kite now too. I might just be bad at this game but I'm pretty sure I cant be the only one that feels this way after playing her.

I am not happy with the Leona Changes. Yes you made her abilities come SLIGHTLY more quickly. But she didn't need that. Her abilities were already on pretty low cool downs. I could easily continue the fight and not just simply stand there. What I don't like is the reduction in Damage on ALL of her abilities. Reduction on q, on shield and on ult. all for what?? A slightly longer root duration. Which is useless because the e q combo stuns before the root was up. So a pointless change that did nothing. But the reduction in damage reallllly hurts her. For example look at my last 2 games leona. 6-2  and 6-2. I did tons of damage and was tanky. but now my reduction in damage will make me useless in return for slightly reduced cool downs. As a leona main with a 65% win rate in ranked I am pissed. Ohhhhhh the ult is slightly better but does 100 less damage. Good god!!!! No these changes made Leona even worse. A fail choice that will do nothing for her.
You're kind of ignoring the extra damage from passive on 3/4/5 aas after an ult.

It lasts for 5 seconds. At rank 3, in order for Leona to make full use of it she needs a minimum of 1.000 attack speed, most likely more because the enemy will be kiting her/running away making it even more difficult for her to get her damage off.

As someone that has played leona the most games in my ranked career, I can tell you that one of the things I was satisfied about having played her so much is that even if my teammates don't follow up properly, or in the context of a early 2v2 exchange in bot lane, my saving grace was that my abilities had some "oomph" to them. Now with the nerfs they don't even have that.
Love how like everyone is scared in the fiora splash
Garen feels no fear, only cheers.
As someone who plays Leona top and jungle, those look like nerfs to me. On the other hand, S ranks for supports are easier. So thanks for that.
**BUT WHEN WILL THE SKT SKINS COME OUT?**
